message.noSlides: Seems you haven't any Slides yet. Head over to the Elysium Slides Module and create some.

list.label: Slide selection
list.helptext: Click in the search field and select your slide collection. You will find your slides under Contents › Elysium Slides, where you can also create new slides.

headline.label: Headline
headline.helpText: Set a heading for the slide. You can use the HTML tags br, i, u, b, strong and span.

customTemplate.cardDescription: Here you can define your own Twig template file for this slide. If you have entered a Twig template file in this field, you must store it manually in your theme.
customTemplate.customTemplatePath:
The path to this file is:
/storefront/component/blur-elysium-slide/custom/{file}.html.twig
customTemplate.hasCustomNotice: Notice: This slide has its own Twig template file defined. Please note this when managing the slide.
